name: Flash Notification
author: Code Work Web

sections.description:
Flash Notification is useful plugin to show your notices, announcements, notifications or any informations on header & footer with style which is perfect for marketing promotions.

Why Flash Notification from Code Work Web:

  • Easy to Use
  • Lightweight
  • Responsive
  • Unlimited Colors
  • Fixed or Absolute Position
  • Add CTA Button
  • Translation Ready
  • 24/7/365 Support

Feedback

If you like this plugin, then please leave us a good rating and review.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the flash folder to the to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. ‘Flash’ Option will be available in Backend
  4. Create new Notification and you are done!
sections.faq:
Plugin is not working

Please disable all plugins and check if it is working properly. Then you can enable all plugins one by one to find out which plugin is conflicting with Flash

short_description: Create custom notification and alert bar for marketing promotions, alerts, increasing click throughs to other pages and so much more.
